mapper.select: select TRIM(to_char(cast(lb.rate*100 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 借贷费率, TRIM(to_char(cast(lb.feeamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 借贷费用, lb.term as 实际占款天数, case when lb.daycount = 'Actual/360' then 'A/360' when lb.daycount = 'Actual/365' then 'A/365F' when lb.daycount = 'Actual/365 (Fixed)' then 'A/365' when lb.daycount = 'Actual/Actual (ISMA)' then 'A/A(ISMA)' when lb.daycount = '30/360 (Bond Basis)' then '30/360' else 'A/365' end as 计息基准, case when lb.paykind = 0 then '首期支付' when lb.paykind = 1 then '到期支付' else '' end as 费用支付方式, lb.fstsetdate as 首期结算日期, case when lb.fstsettype = '0005' then '券券对付(BVB)' when lb.fstsetdate = '0006' then '券费对付(BVP)' when lb.fstsetdate = '0007' then '返券付费解券(BVBF)' else '未知' end as 首期结算方式, lb.endsetdate as 到期结算日期, case when lb.endsettype = '0005' then '券券对付(BVB)' when lb.endsettype = '0006' then '券费对付(BVP)' when lb.endsettype = '0007' then '返券付费解券(BVBF)' else '未知' end as 到期结算方式, i.i_name as 机构名称, tr_type.description as 业务种类, ii.CORE_SYS_CUSTOMER_CODE as 客户号, ii.i_fullname as 客户全称, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordcount/10000 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 券面总额, tr.orddate as 交易日期, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_ytm*100 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 到期收益率, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_aiamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 总应计利息, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordprice-tr.bnd_netprice as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 应计利息, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_netprice as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 净价, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_netprice*tr.ordcount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 净价金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordprice as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 全价, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordprice*tr.ordcount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 全价金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.trdfee as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 实际借贷费用, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordamount / 1 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 现金交割金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.terminate_amount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 费用金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordamount+tr.terminate_amount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 结算金额, tr.i_code as 产品代码, tr.i_name as 产品名称, tr.operator as 经办人, 'T+' || to_char(tr.setdays) 清算速度, tr.intordid as 成交单编号, tb.i_code as 债券代码, tb.b_name as 债券名称, tb.p_class as 债券性质, tb.b_issuer as 债券发行人, tb.b_issue_date as 发行日期, tb.b_start_date as 起息日期, tb.b_mtr_date as 到期日期, tb.b_list_date as 上市流通日, case when INSTR(tb.b_term,'D') > 0 then REPLACE(tb.b_term,'D','日') when INSTR(tb.b_term,'W') > 0 then REPLACE(tb.b_term,'W','周') when INSTR(tb.b_term,'M') > 0 then REPLACE(tb.b_term,'M','月') when INSTR(tb.b_term,'Y') > 0 then REPLACE(tb.b_term,'Y','年') else '' end as 债券期限, lb.REPO_TERM as 借贷期限, lb.REPO_TRADE_VARIETY as 交易品种, (case when tr.resolve = '1' then '仲裁' else '诉讼' end) as 争议解决方式, (case when tr.ignore_flag = 'Y' then '是' else '否' end) as 质押券转换安排, case when tb.b_pay_freq = '0D' then '利随本清' when tb.b_pay_freq = '1Y' then '每年一次' when tb.b_pay_freq = '6M' then '半年一次' when tb.b_pay_freq = '3M' then '每季一次' when tb.b_pay_freq = '1M' then '每月一次' when tb.b_pay_freq = '-1' then '不结息' else '' end as 付息频率, case when tb.b_pay_bizday_convertion = 'Following' then '下一交易日' when tb.b_pay_bizday_convertion = 'Unadjusted' then '不调整' else '' end as 付息方式, case when tb.b_coupon_type = '1' then TRIM(to_char(cast(nvl(tb.b_coupon,0)*100 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) else '' end as 票面利率, case when tb.b_coupon_type = '2' then CONCAT(TRIM(to_char(cast(nvl(tb.b_coupon,0)*10000 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')),'') else '' end as 利差, tir.r_name as 基准利率, g.b_grade as 债券主体评级 FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE tr LEFT JOIN ttrd_auth_user u on tr.operator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN TTRD_INSTITUTION i ON u.i_id = TO_CHAR(i.i_id) left join ttrd_institution ii on tr.partyid = ii.i_id left join TTRD_LB lb on lb.i_code = tr.i_code AND lb.a_type = tr.a_type AND lb.m_type = tr.m_type left join tbnd tb on tb.i_code = lb.u_i_code AND tb.a_type = lb.u_a_type AND tb.m_type = lb.u_m_type left join tir tir on tir.i_code=tb.i_code_bench and tir.a_type = tb.a_type_bench and tir.m_type = tb.m_type_bench left join (select tig.i_code,tere.b_grade from TINSTRUMENT_INST_GRADE tig,TBND_EXT_RATING_ENUM tere where tig.grade = tere.b_grade_number) g on tb.i_code = g.i_code LEFT JOIN ttrd_trade_type tr_type on tr.trdtype = tr_type.trd_type where tr.sysordid = #{sysOrdId} and tr.ref_sysordid is null
